short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension connecting a website to the native FIPS helper application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a supporting application for both our Gmail (Chrome) extension and our Outlook Add-In. This application allows those other two to access the FIPS validated cryptographic libraries on the user's computer for encrypting emails and files.
